commentBody:
AACNY

What you fraudulently call religious liberty is actually establishment of religion and unconstitutional.

Gorsuch's decision was also based upon a blatant fraud, as Hobby Lobby and its priggish owners protested vehemently they could have nothing whatsoever to do with birth control or abortion, all the while making a large percentage of their profit from their trade with China, the biggest abortion enforcer on the planet.

Like so much else on the Right these days, the big lie was used to achieve nefarious goals wrapped up in righteousness and flagrantly false patriotism.

It doesn't matter what he wrote about in that case, what he did was to establish that private religion takes priority over civil law.
